data.name: PAYDAY 2: The Election Day Heist
data.detailed_description:
The Election Day Heist is the third free heist update to PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to take a new contract from the corrupt politician the Elephant called the Election Day job. A free pistol weapon, skill changes, a big stealth update and new assets have been added. This heist was a part of update 25 and is completely free for our players.

Key Features


• A new heist available for free – The Election Day Heist is the third free heist update to PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to take a new contract from the corrupt politician the Elephant called the Election Day heist. Heisters are to help the Elephant get his man Bob McKendrick into the Mayor's office by locating the voting machines. You then need to hack the machines to swing the vote and finally, you need to make sure no suspicion falls on The Elephant.


• A free pistol weapon – The Chimano Custom pistol is also added for free to anyone who joins the Official PAYDAY 2 Community group on Steam.

• The big stealth update – Changes to the stealth are introduced to further improver gameplay. Special thanks to the PAYDAY community for their continued feedback and support.

• New asset types – New assets have been added such as the Spotter who helps to spot guards and the Body Bags asset that lets you share body bags.

• Skill changes – The Spotter skill replaces the Smooth Talker skill, the Camera Loop skill replaces the Lucky Charm skill and the Cleaner skill has been reworked.

• 10 new achievements to unlock – Heisters can now enjoy 10 new and challenging achievements.

data.short_description: The Election Day Heist is the third free heist update to PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to take a new contract from the corrupt politician the Elephant called the Election Day job. A free pistol weapon, skill changes, a big stealth update and new assets have been added.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 8800/ATI Radeon HD 2600 (256MB minimum)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:13 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3/Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce GTX460/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512MB minimum)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:13 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible

data.legal_notice: PAYDAY 2 is a trademark of Starbreeze AB. All other trademarks are properties of their respective owners. Developed by OVERKILL - a Starbreeze Studio and published by 505 Games. All rights reserved.
